    • Method Detail

      • dispose

        public void dispose()

      • getListeners

        public java.util.ArrayList<IEventListener> getListeners(EventPriority priority)
        Returns a ArrayList containing all listeners for this event, and all parent events for the specified priority. The list is returned with the listeners for the children events first.
        Parameters:
        priority - The Priority to get
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing listeners

      • getListeners

        public IEventListener[] getListeners()
        Returns a full list of all listeners for all priority levels. Including all parent listeners. List is returned in proper priority order. Automatically rebuilds the internal Array cache if its information is out of date.
        Returns:
        Array containing listeners

      • shouldRebuild

        protected boolean shouldRebuild()

      • buildCache

        private void buildCache()
        Rebuild the local Array of listeners, returns early if there is no work to do.

                     IEventListener listener)
